seed_pair.target: Vi el fútbol y luego vi una película.
seed_pair.known: I watched the football and then I watched a film.

seed_pair.target: Está intentando decirme lo que quiere.
seed_pair.known: He's trying to tell me what he wants
He's going to ask you tomorrow.

seed_pair.target: Te daría una respuesta si pudiera.
seed_pair.known: He would give you an answer if he could.
The man is trying to help me.

seed_pair.target: Ese hombre va a decirme algo nuevo.
seed_pair.known: That man is going to tell me something new.

seed_pair.target: Ese hombre acaba de empezar a practicar el habla.
seed_pair.known: That man has just started to practise speaking.

seed_pair.target: Esa mujer te ayudaría si pudiera.
seed_pair.known: That woman would help you if she could.

seed_pair.target: Conozco a un hombre joven que quiere trabajar contigo.
seed_pair.known: I know a young man who wants to work with you.
